on reading compounds: 厭忌【エンキ】hatred, dislike, abhorrence, detestation
厭離【オンリ】departing from this world in disdain
厭離穢土【エンリエド】abhorrence of (living in) this impure world
kun reading compounds: 嫌がらせ【いやがらせ】harassment, pestering
飽きる【あきる】to get tired of, to lose interest in, to be fed up with, to have enough
厭う【いとう】to be loath to, to balk at (doing), to grudge (doing), to spare (oneself), to be weary of, to shun, to dislike (an activity, an environment), to hate (an activity), to take (good) care of
